name: Dr. Dice
description:
WARNING: It's kinda hard to tell if the cyan dice are desaturated or not (because APPARENTLY desaturating cyan just makes it more cyan), so good luck with that :)

"What the heck! 3 ones in a row?!"
"Oh come ON just give me a good roll already!"
"Dude I swear my dice is seriously misbehaving right now"
"Alright, this dice is DEFINITELY cursed..."

Dice have it rough. Real rough. Always taking the blame for the random happenings of fate, even when it isn't their fault. Or is it?

Play as Dr. Dice to test, diagnose, and help these cursed dice find some closure!

Credits:
- https://game-icons.net/ - Icons and such
